data:sql-datasource.data:query: SELECT QUADRANT_ACTUALS.REGION, QUADRANT_ACTUALS.DEPARTMENT, QUADRANT_ACTUALS.POSITIONTITLE, QUADRANT_ACTUALS.ACTUAL, QUADRANT_ACTUALS.BUDGET, QUADRANT_ACTUALS.VARIANCE FROM QUADRANT_ACTUALS WHERE REGION = ${REGION} ORDER BY REGION, DEPARTMENT, POSITIONTITLE
SELECT DISTINCT QUADRANT_ACTUALS.REGION FROM QUADRANT_ACTUALS ORDER BY REGION
